ComicInfo.Summary: Sheldon Sampson finds himself compelled to travel to a remote island with his friends where they receive superpowers in an unexplained fashion. Decades later, the heroes of the first generation are unhappy with their children, who have not lived up to the ideals of their parents.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 22:14:12. [CVDB399004] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:42:46. [Issue ID 1096375]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bryan Hitch,Christian Ward,Dave Johnson,Frank Quitely,J. Scott Campbell,Mike Allred,Phil Noto
ComicInfo.Characters: Brandon Sampson,Jules Sampson,Blackstar,Fitz (flashback),Lady Liberty [Grace Kennedy Sampson],Chloe Sampson,Utopian [Sheldon Sampson],Richard Conrad (flashback),George Hutchence (flashback),Brainwave [Walter Sampson]
